text: Wulun nimen yong hanxu de yuyan xiang dai hun de nuren qiuhun, haishi jiang nimen de qiuhun zhi yi yincang zai xinzhong [zhu], dui nimen dou shi wu zui de. An la zhidao, nimen bi jiang sinian tamen, dan nimen buyao tong tamen mimi dinghunyue, nimen ying [an jiao fa] shuo he li dehua. Zai tamen shou wan guiding de dai hun qixian qian [yinwei dai hun qijian faxian huaiyun de nuren, fenmian qian jinzhi zaihun], nimen buyao [yu tamen] queding hunyin guanxi. Nimen dang zhidao, an la dique zhidao nimen xinzhong de yiqie, suoyi, nimen dang jinfang ta. Nimen dang zhidao, an la que shi zui kuanshu de, zui kuanrong de.
